---

**Common Questions:**
- **How do I create a task?** Tap the + button in any column
- **How do I use the Focus Timer?** Tap the timer icon, select a task, and press start
- **How do I add widgets?** Long-press home screen → Add Widget → FlowBoard
- **How do I enable notifications?** Settings → Notifications → FlowBoard
- **Where is my data stored?** All data is stored locally on your iPad
- **How do I export my data?** Tap the gear icon → Data Management → Export Tasks
